member.summary: Class that represents filter information for enumerable endpoints. This includes the required page number and size.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of the page of Enumerable data to return.

member.name: P:Siesta.Configuration.RequestConfiguration.EnumerableFilterInformation.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the page size to partition the Enumerable data into.

member.name: M:Siesta.Configuration.RequestConfiguration.EnumerableFilterInformation.AsQueryDictionary
member.summary: Takes the filter information and transforms it into a dictionary to be used for HTTP query parameters.
member.returns: Dictionary with property name value pairs.
